prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that controls the weather and has a fierce expression.
Show me a powerful creature with orange fur and a majestic mane.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines elements of a lion and a genie.
Give me a design for a legendary Pokemon with strong ties to nature.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the power of storms with fluffy clouds.
Make an image of a Pokemon with a unique blend of ground and flying abilities.
Design a Pokemon that looks both intimidating and regal, with colorful accents.

distinctive_features: Distinctive tail resembling a storm cloud
